医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
从废物到品味：发酵食品的变革力量在圣地亚哥 2024 年 Pittcon 大会上进行的这次采访中，Maria Marco 讨论了她对发酵食品的健康益处、安全性和减少浪费潜力及其生产过程中涉及的微生物过程的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/From-Waste-to-Taste-The-Transformative-Power-of-Fermented-Foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/From-Waste-to-Taste-The-Transformative-Power-of-Fermented-Foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36fec9b4-1b57-4556-a6db-46abd15ee630 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 10:07:00 -0400 From Waste to Taste: The Transformative Power of Fermented Foods
干细胞治疗进展：间充质干细胞在治疗 COVID-19 和流感感染方面显示出潜力宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。包括病毒性人畜共患病在内的传染病的出现使得人们能够对新的治疗方法进行深入研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Stem-cell-therapy-advances-MSCs-show-potential-in-managing-COVID-19-and-influenza-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Stem-cell-therapy-advances-MSCs-show-potential-in-managing-COVID-19-and-influenza-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a582a8e-eb4b-416e-a7ea-12bae9321ea3 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 09:44:37 -0400 Stem cell therapy advances: MSCs show potential in managing COVID-19 and influenza infections
在 COVID-19 大流行期间，患有糖尿病的老年人面临着更高的抑郁风险最近一项针对 2,700 多名加拿大老年人的研究报告显示，患有糖尿病的老年人在 COVID-19 大流行期间面临着更高的抑郁风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Older-adults-with-diabetes-faced-elevated-risk-of-depression-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Older-adults-with-diabetes-faced-elevated-risk-of-depression-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=218b1080-4416-4852-927d-1f6aa58aef82 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 09:26:15 -0400 Older adults with diabetes faced elevated risk of depression during the COVID-19 pandemic
2024 年将成为“iPSC 年” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/2024-is-shaping-up-to-be-e2809cthe-year-of-iPSCse2809d.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/2024-is-shaping-up-to-be-e2809cthe-year-of-iPSCse2809d.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=762242e1-0033-494f-a2e4-f5e7b07a4c1e Wed, 31 Jul 2024 09:07:00 -0400 2024 is shaping up to be “the year of iPSCs"
神经丝轻链被鉴定为帕金森氏症和路易体痴呆症的早期标志物通过监测淀粉样蛋白-β (Aβ) 和磷酸化 tau (p-tau) 蛋白，可以早期检测帕金森病和路易体痴呆中与阿尔茨海默病相关的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Neurofilament-light-chain-identified-as-early-marker-for-Parkinsone28099s-and-dementia-with-Lewy-Bodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Neurofilament-light-chain-identified-as-early-marker-for-Parkinsone28099s-and-dementia-with-Lewy-Bodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45c5d757-99a4-41bb-8009-841f46f145b7 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 08:48:31 -0400 Neurofilament light chain identified as early marker for Parkinson’s and dementia with Lewy Bodies
基于机器学习的味觉预测器，用于从其他味觉中识别苦味、甜味和鲜味研究人员开发了 VirteousMultiTaste，这是一种机器学习工具，可以根据化合物的分子结构和潜在的物理化学特征来区分甜味、鲜味和苦味。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Machine-learning-based-taste-predictor-development-for-identifying-bitter-sweet-and-umami-from-other-taste-sensations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Machine-learning-based-taste-predictor-development-for-identifying-bitter-sweet-and-umami-from-other-taste-sensations.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34184a64-aa36-4391-8590-b7fd5e88d5d7 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 08:41:00 -0400 Machine learning-based taste predictor developed for identifying bitter, sweet, and umami from other taste sensations
研究发现接种 COVID-19 疫苗后心脏病和中风的风险较低一项涉及几乎整个英格兰成年人口的新研究显示，接种 COVID-19 疫苗后，心脏病和中风的发病率比接种疫苗前或未接种疫苗时要低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-finds-lower-risk-of-heart-attacks-and-中风-after-COVID-19-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-finds-lower-risk-of-heart-attacks-and-中风-after-COVID-19-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87558077-7ae6-45c5-9fd3-c21578efce00 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 08:18:33 -0400 Study finds lower risk of heart attacks and strokes after COVID-19 vaccination
世卫组织协调从加沙到阿联酋的大规模医疗后送今天，85 名加沙病人和重伤患者被疏散至阿拉伯联合酋长国 (UAE) 阿布扎比接受专门护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/WHO-coordinates-large-scale-medical-evacuation-from-Gaza-to-UAE.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/WHO-coordinates-large-scale-medical-evacuation-from-Gaza-to-UAE.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bdca2a4-cfb3-4fb9-9307-a6d85f7c1655 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 08:08:38 -0400 WHO coordinates large-scale medical evacuation from Gaza to UAE
Spear Bio 获得 4500 万美元超额认购 A 轮融资，以加速蛋白质研究和疾病诊断产品的推出马萨诸塞州沃本 – (美国商业资讯) – Spear Bio Inc. 是一家生物技术公司，能够利用无处不在的 qPCR 设备测量低至数十个拷贝的蛋白质分子，宣布成功完成 4500 万美元的 A 轮融资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Spear-Bio-secures-2445-million-in-oversubscribed-Series-A-financing-to-accelerate-product-launch-for- Protein-research-和-疾病-诊断.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Spear-Bio-secures-2445-million-in-oversubscribed-Series-A-financing-to-accelerate-product-launch-for- Protein-research-和-疾病-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=780f35e6-1eeb-4a69-bd9f-2b45e36cbfae Wed, 31 Jul 2024 07:53:00 -0400 Spear Bio secures $45 million in oversubscribed Series A financing to accelerate product launch for protein research and disease diagnostics
Asimov 推出人工智能驱动的第四代 CHO Edge 系统，提高滴度保证Asimov 是一家推进治疗药物设计和制造的合成生物学公司，今天宣布推出第四代 CHO Edge 系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Asimov-introduces-its-AI-driven-4th- Generation-CHO-Edge-System-with-increased-titer-guarantee.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Asimov-introduces-its-AI-driven-4th- Generation-CHO-Edge-System-with-increased-titer-guarantee.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5fb127d-933e-463e-8140-24cdc40e53fd Wed, 31 Jul 2024 07:50:00 -0400 Asimov introduces its AI-driven 4th generation CHO Edge System with increased titer guarantee
